NEW_USER_ACCOUNT: Welcome to Eunice Platform! Your account has been created.
EDIT_USER_ACCOUNT: Changes in your Eunice Platform account.
EDIT_USER_ACCOUNT_WITH_PASSWORD: Changes in your Eunice Platform account with a new password.
CHANGE_TICKET_STATUS: Request status has been changed in Eunice Platform.
CHANGE_TICKET_STATUS_CRH: Information about changing request status in Eunice Platform.
DELETE_USER_ACCOUNT: Information about deleting your account in Eunice Platform.
DISABLE_USER_ACCOUNT: Information about disabling your account in Eunice Platform.
NEW_RESPONSE_TICKET: New response to the request in Eunice Platform.
ENABLE_USER_ACCOUNT: Information about enabling your account in Eunice Platform.
